Nautilus.
darius mid.

Jarvan Support. 26% Armor Shred on Q, 35% Slow on W and a Shield that increases per nearby Enemy Champion, E Grants 22% Attack Speed to nearby Ally Champions, Cataclysm (doesn't really even need explanation), and finally his Passive which allows him to win trades against squishy AD Carries in lane 9 times out of 10.

If you build Zeke's Herald, Face of the Mountain and Mikael's Crucible you literally provide everything an AD Carry/Bruiser/Assassin needs. Throw in Thornmail, Ruby Sightstone, Mobility Boots (Captain Enchantment), Oracle's Lens and Elixir of Iron and you will have a huge impact throughout the game.

{{champion:59}} DEMACIA!!!

Azir support, 

His soldiers work with spellthiefs edge he has 3 nockups (seeming most adc's have a dash nowadays) a pretty meaty slow, and a turret
his purpose in lane is just to zone completely the enemy adc, which he can do very effectively without putting himself in danger and most games you can make sure that their adc has consistently under half of your adc's cs during the laning phase, after the laning phase is done he just becomes a cc machine/initiator 
and so requires a tanky support build (with some ap of course for poking purposes)

I made this thread, and didn't even post my favorite off Meta champ

well i have 2

AP noc mid 300+ base damage from E (season 3, haven't played since) at full ranks
AD Malphite, brutal strikes becomes OP by hitting 3 things at once with a basic attack (once again Season 3)
Karma (Tank/Mage) Top! Some [explainations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/NlgtEJRc-favourite-lanerole?comment=0005) here!

> Karma (Tank/Mage) Top! Some [explainations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/NlgtEJRc-favourite-lanerole?comment=0005) here!

I used to play her top before her re-work which ruined her.
She's still good, but I'll miss those 1v2 towerdive baits with the immense damage she did while on low HP.

> > Karma (Tank/Mage) Top! Some [explainations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/NlgtEJRc-favourite-lanerole?comment=0005) here!
> 
> I used to play her top before her re-work which ruined her.
> She's still good, but I'll miss those 1v2 towerdive baits with the immense damage she did while on low HP.

I played a whole bunch of Karma back then before, and still kind of miss her old design - she was all about getting people to underestimate how strong you actually were!  At the time I was really frustrated with the change because of how much I liked playing that style. 

I don't think that the rework ruined her, but just changed the focus on how to play her. She still has a lot of ways to be unpredictably powerful unless you're aware of her strengths - and even still has the ability to really bait people at low hp with the sustain on a Mantra'd W.  She's more of a brutal 1v1'er than a 1vX'er than she used to be, which fits her top pretty well

> > > Karma (Tank/Mage) Top! Some [explainations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/NlgtEJRc-favourite-lanerole?comment=0005) here!
> > 
> > I used to play her top before her re-work which ruined her.
> > She's still good, but I'll miss those 1v2 towerdive baits with the immense damage she did while on low HP.
> 
> I played a whole bunch of Karma back then before, and still kind of miss her old design - she was all about getting people to underestimate how strong you actually were!  At the time I was really frustrated with the change because of how much I liked playing that style. 
> 
> I don't think that the rework ruined her, but just changed the focus on how to play her. She still has a lot of ways to be unpredictably powerful unless you're aware of her strengths - and even still has the ability to really bait people at low hp with the sustain on a Mantra'd W.  She's more of a brutal 1v1'er than a 1vX'er than she used to be, which fits her top pretty well

Well from my perspective of back in the day when her skillcap was really high due to needing to be good at baiting, her skillcap was removed and she was turned into a Use R with Q to poke and W when you're low. I don't mean ruined as unplayable, I mean ruined the experience for myself. It's like how people say even the slightest change to Katarina will either make her asinine or ruin her completely.

The Karma rework, was one of the few I was disappointed with, to be honest. I'd love to see her reworked again to use her fans, as they were cool.
